title: "Google to Make Chrome ‘More Helpful’ With New Machine Learning Additions"
excerpt: "In a new blog post, Google says it’s going to be bringing new features to Chrome via “on device” machine learning (ML). The goal is to improve the browsing experience, and to do so it’s adding several new ML models that will focus on different tasks."
